description.english: Finish one Hidden Object Puzzle without using a Hint.
description.german: Bewältige ein Wimmelbild-Rätsel, ohne einen Tipp zu nutzen.
description.french: Finis une scène d'objets cachés sans utiliser d'indice.
description.italian: Finisci un rompicapo di oggetti nascosti senza usare aiuti.
description.spanish: Completa una prueba de objetos ocultos sin usar pistas.
description.schinese:
不使用提示，完成一个隐藏物品
谜题。

description.brazilian: Conclua um enigma de objeto oculto sem usar dicas.

description.english: Finish three Hidden Object Puzzles without using a Hint.

description.italian: Finisci tre rompicapo di oggetti nascosti senza usare aiuti.
description.spanish: Completa tres pruebas de objetos ocultos sin usar pistas.

description.brazilian: Conclua três enigmas de objeto oculto sem usar dicas.
description.koreana: 힌트를 사용하지 않고 숨은그림찾기 퍼즐 3개를 푸세요.

description.english: Finish five Hidden Object Puzzles in under two minutes each.

description.spanish: Completa cinco pruebas de objetos ocultos sin usar pistas.
description.schinese: 完成五个隐藏物品 谜题，每次不超过两分钟。

description.polish: Ukończ pięć scen z ukrytymi obiektami w czasie krótszym niż dwie minuty.
description.brazilian: Conclua cinco enigmas de objeto oculto sem usar dicas.
description.koreana: 힌트를 사용하지 않고 숨은그림찾기 퍼즐 5개를 푸세요.

description.english: Finish all Hidden Object Puzzles without using a Hint.

description.italian: Finisci tutti i rompicapo di oggetti nascosti senza usare aiuti.
description.spanish: Completa todas las pruebas de objetos ocultos sin usar pistas.
description.schinese: 不使用提示，完成所有隐藏物品 谜题。
description.japanese: ヒントを使わずに アイテム探しを全部クリア。

description.brazilian: Conclua todos os enigmas de objeto oculto sem usar dicas.
description.koreana: 힌트를 사용하지 않고 숨은그림찾기 퍼즐을 모두 푸세요.

description.english: Solve a Puzzle without using Skip.
description.french: Résous un casse-tête sans utiliser Passer.
description.italian: Risolvi un rompicapo senza usare Salta.
description.spanish: Resuelve una prueba sin usar Omitir.

description.japanese: スキップを使わずに パズルを1つクリア。
description.polish: Ukończ jedną zagadkę bez użycia przycisku "Pomiń".

description.english: Solve three Puzzles without using Skip.
description.french: Résous trois casse-tête sans utiliser Passer.
description.italian: Risolvi tre rompicapo senza usare Salta.

description.polish: Ukończ trzy zagadki bez użycia przycisku "Pomiń".

description.english: Solve five Puzzles in under two minutes each.

description.italian: Risolvi cinque rompicapo in meno di due minuti ciascuno.
description.spanish: Resuelve cinco pruebas en menos de dos minutos cada una.
description.schinese: 解决五个谜 题，每次不超过两分钟。

description.brazilian: Reúna três pistas no diário.
description.koreana: 건너뛰기를 사용하지 않고 퍼즐을 모두 푸세요.

description.english: Gather three Clues in your Journal.
description.german: Sammle drei Indizien in deinem Notizbuch.

description.spanish: Reúne tres pistas en tu diario.

description.japanese: 日記に手掛かりを 3つ集める。
description.polish: Znajdź trzy poszlaki związane ze śledztwem.

description.polish: Znajdź pięć poszlak związanych ze śledztwem.

description.english: Gather all nine Clues in your Journal.
description.german: Sammle alle neun Indizien in deinem Notizbuch.

description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie poszlaki związane ze śledztwem.
description.brazilian: Reúna todas as nove pistas no diário.

description.english: Gather full information about all the characters.
description.german: Sammle alle Informationen über sämtliche Personen.
description.french: Réunis toutes les informations sur tous les personnages.
description.italian: Raccogli informazioni complete su tutti i personaggi.

description.schinese: 集齐关于所有人物角色的 所有信息。
description.russian: Соберите полную информацию о всех персонажах.

description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie informacje o każdej z postaci.
description.brazilian: Reúna informações completas sobre todos os personagens.
description.koreana: 모든 캐릭터에 대한 정보를 전부 모으세요.

description.english: Solve your first Detective Mode scene.
description.french: Résous ta première Scène en mode Détective.
description.italian: Risolvi la tua prima Scena Detective.
description.spanish: Resuelve tu primera eScena del modo Detective.
description.schinese: 破解你的第一个 侦探模式场景。
description.japanese: 初めての探偵モードの シーンをクリア。
description.polish: Ukończ pierwszą Scenę w Trybie Detektywa.
description.brazilian: Resolva sua primeira Cena no Modo Detetive.

description.english: Solve all Detective Mode scenes.
description.french: Résous les Scènes en mode Détective.

description.schinese: 破解所有侦探模式场景。
description.japanese: 探偵モードのシーンを全部クリア。
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie Sceny w Trybie Detektywa.
description.brazilian: Solucione tudo no Modo Detetive.

description.english: Find three Hidden Clue Symbols.
description.german: Finde drei Symbole für verborgene Indizien.
description.french: Trouve trois symboles d'indices.
description.italian: Trova tre simboli nascosti.
description.spanish: Encuentra 3 símbolos de pista ocultos.
description.schinese: 找到三个隐藏的线索符号。
description.japanese: 手掛かりシンボルを3つ見つける。
description.brazilian: Encontre 3 símbolos de pista escondida.

description.english: Find three fragments of the Asylum Model.
description.french: Trouve trois fragments de la maquette de l'asile.
description.italian: Trova tre frammenti del mini manicomio.
description.spanish: Encuentra 3 piezas de la maqueta del psiquiátrico.

description.japanese: 病院の模型の パーツを3つ見つける。
description.brazilian: Encontre três fragmentos do Modelo Hospício.

description.english: Find three Phantom Objects.
description.french: Trouve trois objets fantômes.
description.italian: Trova tre oggetti fantasma.
description.spanish: Encuentra tres objetos fantasma.

description.japanese: ファントムアイテムを3つ見つける。

description.english: Find all nine Hidden Clue Symbols.
description.german: Finde alle neun Symbole für verborgene Indizien.
description.french: Trouve les neuf symboles d'indices cachés.
description.italian: Trova tutti e 9 i simboli nascosti.

description.japanese: 9つの手掛かりシンボルを 全部見つける。
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os 9 símbolos de pista escondida.

description.english: Complete the Asylum Model.
description.french: Finis la maquette de l'asile.
description.italian: Completa il mini manicomio.
description.spanish: Completa la maqueta del centro.
description.schinese: 完成精神病院模型。
description.japanese: 病院の模型を完成させる。
description.brazilian: Conclua o Modelo Hospício.

description.english: Find all fifteen Phantom Objects hidden across the game.
description.german: Finde alle 15 im Spiel verborgenen Phantomgegenstände.
description.french: Trouve les 15 objets fantômes cachés dans le jeu.
description.italian: Trova tutti e 15 gli oggetti fantasma nascosti nel gioco.
description.spanish: Encuentra los quince objetos fantasma ocultos en el juego.
description.schinese:
找到游戏中隐藏的所有
十五个幽灵物品。
description.russian: Найдите все 15 фантомных объектов, спрятанных в игре.
description.japanese: ゲームのあちこちに隠されている 15のファントムアイテムを全部見つける。
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie piętnaście obiektów widmo ukrytych w grze.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os 15 objetos fantasmas escondidos no jogo.
description.koreana: 게임 속에 숨겨진 유령 물체 15개를 모두 찾으세요.

description.english: Finish the game without using a Hint.
description.german: Bewältige das Spiel ganz ohne Tipps.
description.french: Finis le jeu sans utiliser d'indice.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco senza usare aiuti.
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin usar pistas.
description.schinese: 不使用提示 完成游戏。
description.japanese: ヒントを1回も使わずに ゲームをクリアする。
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo sem usar dicas.

description.english: View three cut scenes without using Skip.
description.german: Schau dir drei Zwischensequenzen ohne Überspringen an.
description.french: Regarde trois cinématiques sans utiliser Passer.
description.italian: Visualizza tre sequenze animate senza usare Salta.
description.spanish: Ve tres escenas cinemáticas sin usar Omitir.
description.schinese: 不使用跳过，查看三个闪回场景。
description.japanese: スキップしないで カットシーンを3つ見る。
description.polish: Obejrzyj trzy sceny filmowe bez użycia "Pomiń".
description.brazilian: Assista três cenas curtas sem usar Pular.

description.english: Watch all the cutscenes in the game without using Skip.
description.german: Schau dir alle Zwischensequenzen ohne Überspringen an.
description.french: Regarde toutes les cinématiques sans utiliser Passer.
description.italian: Guarda tutte le sequenze animate nel gioco senza usare Salta.
description.spanish: Ve todas las escenas cinemáticas sin usar Omitir.
description.schinese: 不使用跳过，观看游戏中的 所有闪回场景。
description.russian: Посмотрите все игровые ролики, не используя «Пропуск».
description.japanese: スキップしないで カットシーンを全部見る。
description.polish: Obejrzyj wszystkie sceny filmowe bez użycia "Pomiń".
description.brazilian: Assista a todos os vídeos no jogo sem usar Pular.
description.koreana: 건너뛰기를 사용하지 않고 영상을 모두 보세요.

description.english: Disarm all booby traps.
description.french: Désarme tous les pièges.
description.italian: Disattiva tutte le trappole.
description.spanish: Desactiva trampas ocultas.
description.schinese: 解除所有简易陷阱。
description.japanese: ワナを全部解除する。
description.brazilian: Desarme todas as armadilhas.

description.english: Find a way out.
description.french: Trouve une sortie.
description.italian: Trova un'uscita.
description.spanish: Logra salir fuera.
description.schinese: 找到出路。
description.japanese: 出口を見つける。
description.brazilian: Ache uma saída.

description.english: Fight your fears.
description.french: Affronte tes peurs.
description.italian: Combatti la paura.
description.spanish: Combate tus miedos.
description.schinese: 克服恐惧。
description.japanese: 恐怖と戦う。
description.brazilian: Supere seus medos.

description.english: Regain a clear mind.
description.french: Reprends tes esprits.
description.italian: Riacquista la lucidità.
description.spanish: Despeja tu mente.
description.schinese: 重获清醒的头脑。
description.japanese: はっきりとした意識を取り戻す。
description.brazilian: Recupere a mente tranquila.

description.english: Fix the sprinklers.
description.french: Répare les arroseurs.
description.italian: Ripara gli erogatori.
description.spanish: Arregla los aspersores.
description.schinese: 修好喷淋装置。
description.japanese: スプリンクラーを直す。
description.brazilian: Conserte os borrifadores.

description.english: Visit the closed ward.
description.french: Visite la salle fermée.
description.italian: Visita il reparto chiuso.
description.spanish: Visita el pabellón aislado.
description.schinese: 造访封闭病房。
description.japanese: 閉鎖病棟に行く。
description.brazilian: Visite a ala fechada.

description.english: Finish Zed's masterpiece.
description.french: Finis l'œuvre de Zed.
description.italian: Finisci il capolavoro di Zed.
description.spanish: Termina la obra maestra de Zed.
description.schinese: 完成泽德的杰作。
description.japanese: ゼッドの大作を完成させる。
description.brazilian: Termine a obra-prima de Zed.

description.english: Make your way out.
description.french: Échappe-toi.
description.italian: Cerca di uscire.
description.spanish: Encuentra la salida.
description.schinese: 设法找到出路。
description.japanese: 逃げ出す。
description.brazilian: Consiga escapar.

description.english: Learn about Kreuz's secret.
description.french: Découvre le secret de Kreuz.
description.italian: Scopri il segreto della Krauz.
description.spanish: Descubre el secreto de Kreuz.
description.schinese: 掌握克鲁兹的秘密。
description.japanese: クルツの秘密を知る。
description.brazilian: Descubra o segredo de Kreuz.

description.english: Find a way to call for help.
description.french: Trouve un moyen d'appeler à l'aide.
description.italian: Trova il modo di chiedere aiuto.
description.spanish: Pide auxilio.
description.schinese: 想办法呼救。
description.japanese: 助けを呼ぶために逃げる。
description.brazilian: Encontre um meio de pedir ajuda.

description.english: Create your puppet.
description.french: Crée ta marionnette.
description.italian: Crea un pupazzo.
description.spanish: Fabrica una marioneta.
description.schinese: 制作你的木偶。
description.japanese: 人形を作る。
description.brazilian: Crie seu fantoche.

description.english: Be a hero and save lives.
description.french: Agis en héros, sauve des vies.
description.italian: Sii eroe e salva delle vite.
description.spanish: Ármate de valor y salva vidas.
description.schinese: 成为英雄，拯救生命。
description.japanese: 英雄になって人命救助する。
description.brazilian: Seja um herói e salve vidas.

displayName.japanese: 新人マージャンプレイヤー

description.english: Finish a game of Mahjong.
description.french: Finis une partie de mah-jong.
description.italian: Finisci una partita a Mahjong.
description.spanish: Acaba una partida de Mahjong.
description.schinese: 完成一局麻将游戏。
description.japanese: マージャンゲームを1つクリアする。
description.brazilian: Conclua um jogo de Mahjong.

description.english: Finish three games of Mahjong without using Shuffle.
description.german: Meistere drei Runden Mahjong ohne Mischen.
description.french: Finis trois parties de Mah-jong sans utiliser Mélanger.
description.italian: Finisci tre partite a Mahjong senza usare Rimescola.
description.spanish: Completa tres partidas de Mahjong sin usar Mezclar.
description.schinese: 不用洗牌，完成三局 麻将游戏。
description.russian: Сыграйте 3 партии в маджонг без пересдачи костяшек.
description.japanese: シャッフルを使わずにマージャン ゲームを3回クリアする。
description.polish: Ukończ trzy partie Mahjonga bez użycia "Mieszaj".
description.brazilian: Conclua três jogos de Mahjong sem usar Embaralhar.
description.koreana: 섞기를 사용하지 않고 마작 게임을 3회 마치세요.

displayName.japanese: ベテランマージャンプレイヤー

description.english: Finish half of all the games of Mahjong.
description.french: Finis la moitié des jeux de Mah-jong.
description.italian: Finisci metà delle partite di Mahjong.
description.spanish: Completa la mitad de las partidas de Mahjong.
description.schinese: 完成所有麻将游戏中 的一半。
description.japanese: マージャンゲーム全体の半分を クリアする。
description.brazilian: Conclua metade dos jogos  de Mahjong.

description.english: Finish all games of Mahjong.
description.french: Finis tous les Mah-jongs.
description.italian: Finisci tutte le partite a Mahjong.
description.spanish: Acaba todas las partidas de Mahjong.
description.schinese: 完成所有麻将游戏。
description.japanese: マージャンゲームを全部クリアする。
description.brazilian: Conclua todos os jogos de Mahjong.
